descriptionHtml:
I TAKE NO CREDIT IN THIS

ALL I DID WAS UPLOAD IT

I DON\'T KNOW WHO MADE THIS BUT THANK YOU KINDLY

From the Readme.

\"This set only contains greatswords and only replace the daedric greatsword mesh, therefore i seperated
each mesh to their own seperate folder. The texture folder can be dragged into the data folder but you would have
to assign the texture in nifskope depending on how you installed the game. They\'re all numbered so it should be
easy to match them.

If you want to replace another weapon you would have to create the directory of the vanilla mesh and rename the custom mesh
so it matches it. Keep in mind these were made for 2h\'s.


No pictures included so use nifskope to preview them

http://sourceforge.net/projects/niftools/files/nifskope/\"


If someone would be able to make them as seperate craftable items than go for it, i\'d love to see all these in here


There\'s a total of 26 greatsword replacers, now keep in mind , they\'re designed for 2h weapons so using Tytantis\' new mod that let\'s you Dual-Greatswords.


Feel free to post pictures of the swords if you use them
author: Anonymous
